member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.ProductsController.GetProduct(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the product with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The product with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.ProductsController.CreateProduct(Application.Products.Commands.CreateProduct.CreateProductRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new product based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created product.
